positive_examples: This is an example of revolutionary war.
The revolutionary war demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed revolutionary war in this context.
A typical case of revolutionary war would involve these features.
The concept of revolutionary war applies here.
A war fought to overthrow an existing government or political system and establish a new order.
negative_examples: This is an example of civil war, not revolutionary war.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CivilWar, or other types of War

definition: An armed conflict fought to overthrow an existing government or social order.
